article_title: Long-Term Tax Strategy: 5 Questions To Ask Your Advisor

article_metadata.description: The Tax Deadline is quickly approaching and the influx of 2016 tax tips is hitting the newsstands. While it’s a great time to brush up on the tax laws and create a 2016 game plan, it’s also important to take a step back and think about the bigger picture and your long-term tax approach.
article_metadata.author: Mark Avallone
